hero.title: Your Trust is
hero.description: When you entrust Mirathi with your family's legacy, we treat it with the same rigor as a financial institution. Our "Active Intelligence" is built on a foundation of zero-trust security.

encryption.title: AES-256 Data Vault
encryption.description: All documents in the Document Service are encrypted at rest using industry-standard AES-256. Even our database administrators cannot read your files.

sovereignty.title: Kenyan Data Sovereignty
sovereignty.description: We comply with the Data Protection Act 2019 by hosting all sensitive data within legally compliant Availability Zones.

rbac.title: Strict RBAC
rbac.description: Role-Based Access Control ensures a "Verifier" only sees redacted documents assigned to their queue, preserving your privacy.

claim_check.title: "Claim Check" Pattern
claim_check.description: Services never pass raw files. They pass secure "Document IDs". The Document Service acts as the sole, secure gatekeeper.

no_selling.title: We Never Sell Your Data
no_selling.description: Your family information is yours. We do not sell, rent, or trade your personal data to third parties.

encryption_first.title: Encryption First
encryption_first.description: We prioritize encryption at every layer. Data is encrypted in transit (TLS 1.3) and at rest.

data_rights.title: Your Data Rights
data_rights.description: You can request an export or deletion of your data at any time, in full compliance with the KDPA.

audit_logs.title: Immutable Audit Logs
audit_logs.description: Every action within the system is logged. This creates a forensic trail for legal validity.
